channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HiCinema
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HiCinema

item.title: CVE-2017-17325|2024-08-05T20:51:31.028Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- hicinema
item.description: Huawei video applications HiCinema with software of 8.0.3.308; 8.0.4.300 have a permission control vulnerability. Due to improper verification of specific interface, an attacker who is on the same network with the user can obtain some information through a man-in-the-middle attack.
